requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or later
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Athlon 64 or later
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/10 (latest service pack)
  • Processor: Intel core i5-6400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 280 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct11
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports
